42688630456507.name: Candy Cigarettes - 24ct
42688630456507.desc: Gee Wiz. These 1950's inspired Candy Cigarette packs are the perfect addition to a retro party. Puff on these as a sugary and healthier alternative to the regular variety. Their chalky texture and light, minty flavor are a mouth freshener. And their pretty white coloring make them a perfect match for any occasion. Have a friend who's calling it quits? Need realistic and yummy props for a school play? Having a get together in a non-smoking environment? Get a package of these to do it all. With 1 candy cigarettes per pack and 24 packs per order, you'll be puffing in the deliciousness all day long.

42688408355003.name: Haribo Happy Cola Bottles - 5lb
42688408355003.desc: There's nothing like a cold glass of bubbling, refreshing cola on a hot summer's day. Well, unless you count these amazing little Haribo Gummi Cola Bottles! With a sharp, cola flavor and the delicious chew Haribo is famous for, all your sweet snackers will love you for bringing these home. Bring some to your next picnic, add a festive element to a backyard BBQ, or even keep some around the house for snacking. Haribo first made their chewy debut in 1922 in Germany with the creation of the famous Gummi Bear. See for yourself why they earned the slogan, ''Kids and grown-ups love it so the happy world of Haribo!''These are the regular sized Haribo cola bottles. They do not have any writing on them. The Super Cola Bottles are larger and have Haribo written on them.

42690264596667.name: Pez Pokemon Assortment - 12ct
42690264596667.desc: Each box will contain a mix of characters - the characters are randomly assorted by Pez

42688385417403.name: Gummi Mini Burgers - 60ct Box
42688385417403.desc: It should be considered a crime to throw a party without having Gummi Mini Burgers to hand out. They are fun, flavorful, affordable, and the perfect representation of one of the most popular all-American foods. Plus, they are a hit with folks of all ages. Pass out these little gummy burgers at your child's next slumber party, and everyone will be nominating you for the "Parent of the Year" award. Gummi Mini Burgers are everything you love in a gummy candy, only served up in an unconventional and totally fun way. Everyone serves gummi worms and bears at their party. Outshine them with these delicious candies. You can even dissect them to create special orders. Would you like extra pickles?

42690230911163.name: Big League Chew Baseball Bat And Gumballs - 12ct
42690230911163.desc: Big League Chew Baseball Bat With Gumballs - 12ct

42688559317179.name: PEZ Big Rigs Trucks - 12ct
42688559317179.desc: Pez Big Rigs Trucks are so awesomely detailed, it might take a while to learn that the plastic toys also contain crunchy candy! A quirky PEZ dispenser in shape of an eighteen-wheeler rig makes a great addition to a birthday party and a boyish favor for a bachelor party. Each plastic truck is a different color, but each freight compartment contains a perfect stack of tasty little PEZ tablets for your enjoyment. Tuck one in a backpack to deliver a special candy surprise! Wholesale PEZ Big Rigs come individually wrapped for easy use as stocking stuffers (or convenient resale on impulse shelves and in fundraiser). Each packet in this bulk lot contains a truck-shaped PEZ dispenser and a packet of the familiar pressed-sugar candies, so the truck hauls candy goodness straight to your mouth! Bring your sweet tooth to the treat highway with this colorful novelty, the PEZ Big Rigs Truck.

42689119191227.name: Ooze Tubes Sour Gel Candy - 12ct
42689119191227.desc: Three flavors of sour gel candy in fun Ooze Tubes! These fun novelty toy candies will keep your kids and their friends entertained for hours. Just squeeze the tubes and out comes the ooze.

42688385482939.name: Gummy Strawberry-Filled Kissing Lips - 2lb
42688385482939.desc: These candies look so good and taste even more amazing that we could just kiss them! And they're sure to kiss every snacker back with their gleaming red lips and delicious candy chew. Bring home a bulk order of these Gummy Kissing Lips Candies today and you'll experience a delicious and loveable treat complete with a marshmallow base and chewy red gummy candy top. In the shape of lips, these candies make a cheeky addition to any bachelorette party or Valentine's Day gift. They even can be used in goodie bags for a spa party or anything girly you can dream up. If you love red gummy candy and marshmallow, then bring some home today.

42688630128827.name: Bubble Gum Cigarettes Candy - 24ct
42688630128827.desc: Good Golly! These 1950s inspired Bubblegum Cigarettes are the perfect addition to a retro party. Puff on these as a chewy and healthier alternative to the regular variety. Their bubble blowing, chewy goodness and light, bubblegum flavor are a treat for your mouth. And their pretty pink coloring make them a perfect match for any occasion. Have a friend who's calling it quits? Need realistic and yummy props for a school play? Having a get together in a non-smoking environment? Get a package of these to do it all. With 24 bubblegum cigarettes per pack, you'll be puffing in the deliciousness all day long.

44600713412795.name: Satellite Wafers Candy - Sour & Original - 240ct
44600713412795.desc: It's a UFO! These Satellite Wafers Candies are invading airspace and mouth space with their amazing light, wafer exterior, and beaded candy interior. In a rainbow of colors and flavors, these old fashioned candies will delight every extraterrestrial and human candy fan. Bring some to a party for a fun way to satisfy a sweet tooth, bring a handful to a science fair for some thematic snacking, or even surprise your future astronauts with a taste of outer space. Whatever you do, this 240 count package of Satellite Wafers Candy will take you on a flavor journey that's ''out of this world. ''

42690312110267.name: Mad Science Mini Chews Candy Beakers - 12ct

42690320892091.name: Magic Potion Sour Liquid Color-Changing Candy - 12ct

42688883785915.name: Marvel Avengers Pop-Ups Lollipops Toys - 6ct
42688883785915.desc: Keep your Chupa Chup lollipops in a fun Avenger toy! Inspired by the Marvel Avengers movie, these lollipop holder toys will house your lollipop and protect it for you. Just push it up to start enjoying your pop! Includes 3 flavors of iconic Chupa Chups lollipops.

42688422412475.name: Cinnamon Toothpicks Hotlix - 20ct
42688422412475.desc: Nothing tops off a good meal like Cinnamon Toothpix to clean your teeth! Sit back, relax, and freshen your breath with these cinnamon flavored sticks. The are infused with real cinnamon oil!They are a great, flavorful tool to keep around the house for guests, to keep in your purse if you need one, or just to chew on if you love the cinnamony flavor! In reusable tubes, these pointy picks can be stored safely without worry of poking yourself or others. And when you're done, you can use the tube again to store some more! Bring some of these home today to help you attain a cleaner mouth and enjoy a taste of spicy cinnamon every time you use them.
